alert.note: Alert for Pope; Stevens; Swift (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Pope, southern Stevens and Swift Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 830 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Oliver, or 14 miles south of Morris, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hancock around 845 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Lake Hassel. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 17 and 51. U.S. Highway 59 between mile markers 136 and 162. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for west central Minnesota.
